boardleaders

    How to play

    • The game gives arithmetic operations your task is to answer correctly
    • Points are added for a correct answer, points are deducted for an incorrect one.
    • The game has two modes "Practice" - endless mode and "Time attack" - before the end of time you need to score the maximum number of points
    • "Leaderboard" - you can see the best result of yourself and other players
    • if you are using only the keyboard, then to move between elements use "Tab" and back "Tab + Shift", and for change mode use arrows button "Left" and "Right", for select use button "Enter"
